cards.text:
Reach
When Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.

cards.name: Titanic Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

cards.name: Trollhide
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature." (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

cards.name: Adaptive Automaton
cards.text:
As Adaptive Automaton enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Adaptive Automaton is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

cards.name: Angel's Feather
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

cards.name: Crown of Empires
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature. Gain control of that creature instead if you control artifacts named Scepter of Empires and Throne of Empires.

cards.name: Crumbling Colossus
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
When Crumbling Colossus attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

cards.name: Demon's Horn
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

cards.name: Dragon's Claw
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

cards.name: Druidic Satchel
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. If it's a land card, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Elixir of Immortality
cards.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

cards.name: Greatsword
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+0.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Kite Shield
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+3.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Kraken's Eye
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.

cards.name: Manalith
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Pentavus
cards.text:
Pentavus enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Pentavus: Put a 1/1 colorless Pentavite artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
{1}, Sacrifice a Pentavite: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pentavus.

cards.name: Quicksilver Amulet
cards.text: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Rusted Sentinel
cards.text: Rusted Sentinel enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Scepter of Empires
cards.text: {T}: Scepter of Empires deals 1 damage to target player. It deals 3 damage to that player instead if you control artifacts named Crown of Empires and Throne of Empires.

cards.name: Solemn Simulacrum
cards.text:
When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Sundial of the Infinite
cards.text: {1}, {T}: End the turn. Activate this ability only during your turn. (Exile all spells and abilities on the stack. Discard down to your maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

cards.name: Swiftfoot Boots
cards.text:
Equipped creature has hexproof and haste.
Equip {1}

cards.name: Thran Golem
cards.text: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.

cards.name: Throne of Empires
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield. Put five of those tokens onto the battlefield instead if you control artifacts named Crown of Empires and Scepter of Empires.

cards.name: Worldslayer
cards.text:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy all permanents other than Worldslayer.
Equip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Wurm's Tooth
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.

cards.name: Buried Ruin
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buried Ruin: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Dragonskull Summit
cards.text:
Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Drowned Catacomb
cards.text:
Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Glacial Fortress
cards.text:
Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Rootbound Crag
cards.text:
Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Sunpetal Grove
cards.text:
Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
